title: Yogi's Treasure Hunt
overview: Yogi's Treasure Hunt started in 1985 of September in the fall. The show focus on Yogi Bear and his friends from the Hanna Barbera family like, Quick Draw, Huckleberry Hound, Auggie Doggy and Doggy Daddy, Dasterdly and Mudley and all the memorable favorites from the past. The show explains how the gang get together to find the missing treasure.
